author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we unbox and test out the all-new ZIMA Board 2 X86 SBC! Small form factor with a PCIe slot allows you to connect a real graphics card for GPU-accelerated AI like LLMs, image, and video generation! We had to test some gaming on this single-board computer; it supports Windows and Linux operating systems, so the choice is yours. Create a home lab, media server, NAS, AI machine. The possibilities are endless with the ZIMA Board 2. #zimaboard2 #SBC #linux #windows #etaprime 

Lear more Here: https://www.zimaspace.com/products/single-board2-server
